name: You've Got Mail (AcidicDuck)
description:
You've just started working for a mail service that requires you to sort all the incoming letters down their respective pipes in order for them to be delivered correctly! Now, be sure to keep your boss happy. He can be, for a better word... punctilious?

Catch the letters as they fall down and make sure to put them in the right pipes. Conditions appear as you go along, so be sure to keep them in mind!!!

Game Created for Vimlark's "Ready Set Jam" with the theme "Four Colours".
Game, alongside all assets besides the music, created by AcidicDuckGames
